author-comment.p: This is just a sample; it validates against the DTD, but I’m not claiming any more than that.

abstract.p: This is the abstract for an example article. Given that the article is about nothing, so is the abstract.

body.p: This is just a sample XML document written to conform to the JATS 1.2 Authoring DTD. Beyond conforming to the DTD, it’s really got nothing to offer.
